name: Funtoshop for Game Boy Camera
short_description: This powerful software allows you to edit the shots taken with your olde GB Pocket Camera. It covers many features of the original device, as the frame editing, the stamp mode, and contains some others useful functions.

os.fullpath: Operating System :: Modern (Vendor-Supported) Desktop Operating Systems :: WinXP
